com.epam.finaltask.service

Class TopicService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.finaltask.service.AbstractService
      • com.epam.finaltask.service.TopicService

  • public class TopicService
extends AbstractService
    Service class which provides methods to add and manipulate database topics.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TopicService

        public TopicService(DaoFactory daoFactory,
                    ConnectionManagerFactory connectionManagerFactory)
        Creates TopicService with chosen DaoFactory and ConnectionManagerFactory implementations.
        Parameters:
        daoFactory - Factory which is used to create DAO objects
        connectionManagerFactory - Factory which is used to create AbstractConnectionManager subclass instances

      • TopicService

        public TopicService()
        Creates TopicService with with default DaoFactory and ConnectionManagerFactory defined in AbstractService no-arguments constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • closeTopic

        public boolean closeTopic(long topicId)
                   throws ServiceException
        Changes topic closed flag to true.
        Parameters:
        topicId - Id of the topic to close
        Returns:
        true if topic successfully closed, else returns false
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • changeTopicHiddenState

        public boolean changeTopicHiddenState(long topicId,
                                      boolean hide)
                               throws ServiceException
        Sets topic hidden flag to the chosen value.
        Parameters:
        topicId - Id of the topic which flag should be set
        hide - State to set to the topic's hidden flag
        Returns:
        true if topic's hidden flag was set, else returns false
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findTopicByTitle

        public Topic findTopicByTitle(java.lang.String title)
                       throws ServiceException
        Looks for topic in the database by title.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the topic to look for
        Returns:
        Topic with chosen title, if it exists in the database. Esle returns null
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • createTopic

        public boolean createTopic(Account account,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String text)
                    throws ServiceException
        Creates topic with chosen account, title and text and adds it to the database.
        Parameters:
        account - Account of the topic creator
        title - Title of the topic to create
        text - Text of the topic to create
        Returns:
        true if topic was successfully created and added to the database. Else returns null
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findTopicById

        public Topic findTopicById(long topicId)
                    throws ServiceException
        Looks for topic in the database by title.
        Parameters:
        topicId - Id of the topic to look for
        Returns:
        Topic with chosen id, if it was found. Else returns null
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findAllTopics

        public java.util.List<Topic> findAllTopics()
                                    throws ServiceException
        Returns all topics from the database sorted by date descending.
        Returns:
        All database topics sorted by date descending
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findTopicsByTitleSubstring

        public java.util.List<Topic> findTopicsByTitleSubstring(java.lang.String searchString)
                                                 throws ServiceException
        Finds topics by it's title substring.
        Parameters:
        searchString - Title substring used to search topics.
        Returns:
        All topics which titles contained chosen substring
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database
